featured.text: This group of islands off the coast of Ecuador has recently contracted Argentine Corporación America to manage the redevelopment of the airport on the island of Baltra.

definition.zh_def: 巴爾特拉（Baltra）是一個位於厄瓜多爾加拉帕戈斯群島的島嶼，以其豐富的野生動物和旅遊景點而聞名。
definition.en_def: Baltra is an island in the Galápagos archipelago of Ecuador, known for its rich wildlife and tourist attractions.
definition.example: We visited Baltra to explore its unique wildlife and beautiful landscapes.
